feature.name: deployment-production
feature.title: Deploy Static Website to Production
feature.description: Set up automated deployment pipeline for static website to production using GitHub Pages, Cloudflare CDN, and custom domain

complexity.reasoning: Micro feature with 5-6 stories, 2-3 hours effort. Single developer, straightforward infrastructure setup following established patterns. No architectural changes, no database migrations. GitHub Pages + Cloudflare + GitHub Actions configuration.

changes: Create GitHub Actions workflow for build/test/deploy
Configure Cloudflare DNS for custom domain
Point Google Domains to Cloudflare nameservers

pattern.gitWorkflow: Automatic deployment on push to main
